jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy module¶

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.cyclogeostrophy(u_geos: ndarray | MaskedArray, v_geos: ndarray | MaskedArray, dx_u: ndarray, dx_v: ndarray, dy_u: ndarray, dy_v: ndarray, coriolis_factor_u: ndarray | MaskedArray, coriolis_factor_v: ndarray | MaskedArray, method: Literal['variational', 'penven', 'ioannou'] = 'variational', n_it: int | None = None, lr: float = 0.005, res_eps: float = 0.0001, res_init: float | Literal['same'] = 'same', res_filter_size: int = 3) → Tuple[ndarray | MaskedArray, ndarray | MaskedArray]¶

Computes velocities from cyclogeostrophic approximation using a variational (default) or iterative method.

Parameters:

  • u_geos (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – U geostrophic velocity value

  • v_geos (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – V geostrophic velocity value

  • dx_u (np.ndarray) – U spatial step along x

  • dx_v (np.ndarray) – V spatial step along x

  • dy_u (np.ndarray) – U spatial step along y

  • dy_v (np.ndarray) – V spatial step along y

  • coriolis_factor_u (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – U Coriolis factor

  • coriolis_factor_v (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – V Coriolis factor

  • method (Literal["variational", "penven", "ioannou"], optional) – numerical method to use, defaults to “variational”

  • n_it (int, optional) – maximum number of iterations, defaults to N_IT_IT

  • lr (float, optional) – gradient descent learning rate, defaults to LR_VAR

  • res_eps (float, optional) – residual tolerance: if residuals are smaller, we consider them as equal to 0, defaults to EPS_IT

  • res_init (Union[float | Literal["same"]], optional) – residual initial value: if residuals are larger at the first iteration, we consider that the solution diverges. If equals to “same” (default) absolute values of the geostrophic velocities are used. Defaults to RES_INIT_IT

  • res_filter_size (int, optional) – size of the convolution filter (from Ioannou) used when computing the residuals, defaults to RES_FILTER_SIZE_IT

Returns:

U and V cyclogeostrophic velocities

Return type:

Tuple[Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray], Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]]

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.LR_VAR = 0.005¶

Default learning rate for the gradient descent of the variational approach

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.N_IT_IT = 100¶

Default maximum number of iterations for the iterative approach

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.N_IT_VAR = 2000¶

Default maximum number of iterations for the variational approach

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.RES_EPS_IT = 0.0001¶

Default residual tolerance of the iterative approach

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.RES_FILTER_SIZE_IT = 3¶

Default size of the grid points used to compute the residual in Ioannou’s iterative approach

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.RES_INIT_IT = 'same'¶

Default residual value used during the first iteration

jaxparrow
